definition[0]: something you say that is intended to be funny, not serious
example[0]: I wasn’t sure whether to treat her words as a jest.
example[1]: His serious face told me that he was not speaking in jest.
definition[1]: to say things that you do not really mean in order to amuse people
example[2]: ‘Do I look as if I am jesting?’ she asked, her face pale and tense.
